creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: "Maximum Rocknroll (MRR) is a widely distributed monthly fanzine dedicated to supporting the underground punk rock scene." MRR has published over 400 issues since its inception in 1982, and provides readers with interviews, scene reports, reviews, photography and art, columns, classifieds, and directories for punk rock networking. Each issue is offset printed in black and white on newsprint, with occassional issues featuring color printed covers.
title: Maximum Rocknroll #329
